name: Home Renovation
description:
You have been tasked with renovation this house. Now, get rid off all the old stuff!!!

Throw all the furniture before the time runs out.

Controls:

Grab objects with left mouse button, rotate camera with w-a-s-d keys and right mouse button.

Credits: 

Serkan Pekçetin

Serhat Bayılı

Ozan Emirhan Bayyurt
